title: Google Stadia Controller To Launch Missing Features - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.17.19
description:
Greg and Fran discuss the state Stadia is launching in.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:20 - Housekeeping
Gamescast this afternoon: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and Luigi’s Mansion 3!
THIS WEEKEND, Kinda Funny’s taking Toronto! EGLX is Saturday and Sunday! kindafunny.com/events!
Extra Life is Saturday 11/2! 24 hours of games for charity! Join us now at kindafunny.com/extralife or watch on the day!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:26 - Stadia’s Wireless Controller Won’t Be Totally Wireless at Launch, Jay Peters @ The Verge
00:14:15 Best Friend Q. - If Xcloud just works and offers consumers another way to play the games they own on xbox, do you think google can win over enough consumer confidence to be successful with Stadia or in five years will you be able to swap out google daydream and insert Stadia into there most recent announcement? - Parker Petrov
00:24:04 - Blizzard bans American University Kids, Patrick Klepek @ Vice
00:26:35 Best Friend Q. - Do you believe Blizzard finally got around to seeing this team and give them the same punishment, or was it the fans outrage that they didn't get the same penalty as Blitzchung cause the ban? - RobbyRob
00:32:12 - Capcom Will Revive Dormant IPs, Dustin Bailey @ PCGamesN
00:36:44 - Outer Worlds WILL be PS4 Enhanced, Private Division Twitter
00:38:20 - Out today
00:42:42 -  BROOKLINEN
00:44:03 - MANSCAPED
00:45:17 -  ESCAPE THE INVASION
Reader mail   -
00:47:05 - Have you been keeping up with the upcoming release of WWE 2K20? - BigBrainOnBrad
00:53:35 - Now that Bungie is independent from Activision, do you see them making any kind of M rated content for Destiny? - Will Brewster
00:55:40 - Squad Up: Spencer(Origin on PC) - BarretsGaming
00:56:46 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Imran and Tim / GAMESCAST: Thursday, 10/16 @ 2 p.m.
